title: The substance of two sermons one touching composing of controversies, another touching unity of judgement and love amongst brethren : preached in two honourable conventions of parliament : the former, Jan. 27, 1657, the other, Feb. 4, 1658 / by Edward Reynolds ...
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ...,
notes: Imperfect: second sermon lacking on film.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
